column4: UPDATE 3-Tesla moves into batteries that store energy for homes  businesses
column5: LOS ANGELES  April 30 Tesla Motors Inc  on Thursday unveiled Tesla Energy - storage systems or batteries for homes  companies and utilities that will expand its business beyond electric vehicles and tap into a fast-growing area of the energy industry.

column4: Tesla unveils suite of batteries for homes  businesses
column5: HAWTHORNE  Calif.  April 30 Tesla Motors Inc  Chief Executive Elon Musk unveiled Tesla Energy - a suite of batteries for homes  businesses and utilities - a highly-anticipated plan to expand its business beyond electric vehicles.
